amendment.description: To exclude power supply circuits, drivers, and devices designed to be connected to, and power, light-emitting diodes or organic light-emitting diodes providing illumination or ceiling fans using direct current motors from energy conservation standards for external power supplies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3168 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3168 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2148) To exclude power supply circuits, drivers, and devices designed to be connected to, and power, light-emitting diodes or organic light-emitting diodes providing illumination or ceiling fans using direct current motors from energy conservation standards for external power supplies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3168 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3168 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 2953.
